Now you can play this legendary version directly in your browser — free and unblocked!

What is Minecraft Beta 1.3 Unblocked?

Minecraft Beta 1.3 Unblocked is a web-playable version of the classic 2011 update that changed how Minecraft looked, felt, and functioned. This version added the ability to sleep through nights, introduced smooth lighting for realistic visuals, and implemented the new chunk-based save format for better performance. It’s the perfect mix of nostalgia and innovation — now easily accessible from school or work networks, completely unblocked.

Key Features of Minecraft Beta 1.3 Unblocked
